K10D0124_H0126:428a-12: skyabs su 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal thar bgyi ste //
K10D0124_H0126:428a-13: rga shi bral ba'i gnas kyang bstan par bgyi //
K10D0124_H0126:428a-14: bye ba khrag khrig bdud kyi spyod yul ni //
K10D0124_H0126:428a-15: thams cad rgyal ba'i spyod yul du yang bgyi //
K10D0124_H0126:428a-16: sems can bdud kyi yul nas stongs nas su //
K10D0124_H0126:428a-17: drang srong chen po'i yul du drang bar bgyi //
K10D0124_H0126:428a-18: bde bar gshegs pas zhi ba'i chos bstan pa //
K10D0124_H0126:428a-19: gang gis thos nas gang la'ang mi reg pa //
K10D0124_H0126:428a-20: de dag mchog gi tshul la gnas par 'gyur //
K10D0124_H0126:428a-21: 'dren pa srog chags rnams kyi ston par 'gyur //
K10D0124_H0126:428a-22: chos nyid 'di ltar mi gang rab rtogs shing //
K10D0124_H0126:428a-23: ston pa rgyal ba'i dbang po'i spyan snga nas //
K10D0124_H0126:428a-24: bstan bcos kun la mkhas shing 'jigs bral ba //
K10D0124_H0126:428a-25: de dag bla na med pa'i bde gshegs 'gyur //
K10D0124_H0126:428a-26: stong pa 'di nyid gang gis rab rtogs shing //
K10D0124_H0126:428b-0: stong par dmigs pa'i 'du shes @428b bral gyur na //
K10D0124_H0126:428b-1: de dag ma smas bde bar gshegs par 'gyur //
K10D0124_H0126:428b-2: srog chags bye ba mang po 'grol bar bgyid //
K10D0124_H0126:428b-3: mkhas pa btsog pa la ni mi dga' ste //
K10D0124_H0126:428b-4: zas kyi ro rnams la yang chags ma mchis; ;rtogs pa'i dgon pa'i gnas la shin tu mos //
K10D0124_H0126:428b-5: de dag rkang gnyis dam pa mkhas par 'gyur //
K10D0124_H0126:428b-6: sbyangs pa gang dag stobs bcus bsngags pa dag /
K10D0124_H0126:428b-7: de dag rtag tu rab tu gnas par 'gyur //
K10D0124_H0126:428b-8: 'phags pa'i rigs la de dag rtag tu dga'//
K10D0124_H0126:428b-9: rab tu dga' bas byang chub mchog kyang thob //
K10D0124_H0126:428b-10: de dag chos rnams bde bar gshegs pas bsngags //
K10D0124_H0126:428b-11: de la mkhas pa gnas pas 'di mthong ste //
K10D0124_H0126:428b-12: zhi ba gang la bde gshegs gnas pa yi //
K10D0124_H0126:428b-13: byang chub de ni 'jig rten 'dren pas bsngags //
K10D0124_H0126:428b-14: 'dren pa khyod las stong pa deng thos te //
K10D0124_H0126:428b-15: ye shes bla na med pa'ang bdag gis bsgrubs //
K10D0124_H0126:428b-16: sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bor 'gyur bar bgyi //
K10D0124_H0126:428b-17: mi mkhas 'gro ba dag kyang rnam par dgrol //
K10D0124_H0126:428b-18: thub pa khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
K10D0124_H0126:428b-19: gang la log pa'i blo gros mi dmigs shing //
K10D0124_H0126:428b-20: chos rnams kun la khyod ni the tshom bral //
K10D0124_H0126:428b-21: de slad 'jig rten khyod dang 'dra ma mchis //
K10D0124_H0126:428b-22: 'dren pa bde bar gshegs la gang bstod pa'i //
K10D0124_H0126:428b-23: bsod nams mi chung bdag gis bsags pas na; ;bdag ni de yi dge ba'i las 'di yis //
K10D0124_H0126:428b-24: mi yi gtso bo 'dren par 'gyur bar shog /
K10D0124_H0126:428b-25: de nas bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po
K10D0124_H0126:428b-26: lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin gyis bcom ldan 'das
K10D0124_H0126:429a-0: de bzhin @429a *// gshegs pa dga' mchog de la
K10D0124_H0126:429a-1: tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod
K10D0124_H0126:429a-2: nas dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa brjod du
K10D0124_H0126:429a-3: med par sems kyang smyos pa dang /
K10D0124_H0126:429a-5: gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der 'dren pa skyes bu chen por gyur to //
K10D0124_H0126:429a-6: nam yang log par ltung bar ma gyur to //
K10D0124_H0126:429a-7: nam yang gzhan gyi dring la 'jog par ma gyur to //
K10D0124_H0126:429a-8: nam yang gzhan gyi ngor lta bar ma gyur ro //
K10D0124_H0126:429a-9: nam yang bskal pa brjod du med par tha na
K10D0124_H0126:429a-10: se gol gtogs pa tsam gyi bar du sems can
K10D0124_H0126:429a-11: rnams yongs su smin par ma byas par ma gyur
K10D0124_H0126:429a-12: to // thams cad zil gyis gnon pa /

K10D0124_H0126:429a-15: zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa
K10D0124_H0126:429a-17: thams cad zil gyis gnon pa /

K10D0124_H0126:429a-21: tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu grags byin zhes
K10D0124_H0126:429a-23: thams cad zil gyis gnon pa /

K10D0124_H0126:429a-31: mkhas pa'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur to //

K10D0124_H0126:429b-1: bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam
K10D0124_H0126:429b-2: du 'dzin na / khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o //
K10D0124_H0126:429b-4: byang chub sems dpa' skyob byin zhes bya ba de'i
K10D0124_H0126:429b-5: tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu tsandan snying po
K10D0124_H0126:429b-7: thams cad zil gyis gnon pa /

K10D0124_H0126:429b-14: byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon bzang po de de'i
K10D0124_H0126:429b-15: tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu tshangs pa'i mig
K10D0124_H0126:429b-18: gang rigs kyi bu des pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de ni /
K10D0124_H0126:429b-19: byang chub sems dpa' mes byin yin no //

K10D0124_H0126:429b-21: byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong yin no //

K10D0124_H0126:429b-23: byang chub sems dpa' dbang pos byin yin no //
K10D0124_H0126:429b-24: de'i tshe de'i dus na gang rigs kyi bu spobs pa mtha' yas su gyur pa de ni /
K10D0124_H0126:429b-25: byang chub sems dpa' chu'i lha yin no //
K10D0124_H0126:429b-26: thams cad zil gyis gnon pa /
K10D0124_H0126:429b-28: de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i rigs shing s'a
K10D0124_H0126:429b-29: la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin zhes
K10D0124_H0126:429b-30: bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam
K10D0124_H0126:429b-31: du 'dzin na / thams cad zil gyis gnon pa /
K10D0124_H0126:429b-32: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o //
K10D0124_H0126:430a-1: gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na
K10D0124_H0126:430a-2: bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu'i
K10D0124_H0126:430a-3: bu nyi mas byin zhes bya bar gyur te /
K10D0124_H0126:430a-4: thams cad zil gyis gnon pa /
K10D0124_H0126:430a-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa dang /
K10D0124_H0126:430a-7: gzhan gyis mi bkri bar 'dod pa dang /
K10D0124_H0126:430a-8: gzhan gyi ngor mi lta bar 'dod na /
K10D0124_H0126:430a-9: chos kyi dbyings la rab tu 'jug pa'i p;hyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsten par bya /
K10D0124_H0126:430a-12: chos zab mo mnyan pa'i phyir yongs su 'dri ba'i ngang tshul can du bya'o //
K10D0124_H0126:430a-13: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0124_H0126:430a-15: 'di ltar stobs bskyed pas chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pa /
K10D0124_H0126:430a-16: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zil gyis gnon pa
K10D0124_H0126:430a-17: 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed
K10D0124_H0126:430a-18: cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed lags /
K10D0124_H0126:430a-19: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig la yongs su zhu ba zhus lags /
K10D0124_H0126:430a-20: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10D0124_H0126:430a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0124_H0126:430a-23: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyis dang /
K10D0124_H0126:430a-27: lo ma rnams rdul phra rab tu byas kyang bgrang bar nus kyi /
K10D0124_H0126:430b-0: byang @430b chub sems dpa' thams cad zil gyis gnon
K10D0124_H0126:430b-1: pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las dge
K10D0124_H0126:430b-2: ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /
K10D0124_H0126:430b-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la chos kyi dbyings su yongs su zhus pa dang /
K10D0124_H0126:430b-4: chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang /
K10D0124_H0126:430b-5: thabs mkhas pa la 'jug pa yongs su dris pa ni /
K10D0124_H0126:430b-8: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med /
K10D0124_H0126:430b-13: brjod du med pa de'i pha rol gyi'ang ches pha
K10D0124_H0126:430b-14: rol na zhi ba'i phung po'i bskal pa la sangs
K10D0124_H0126:430b-15: rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med cing sangs rgyas kyi
K10D0124_H0126:430b-16: zhing tshad med par yongs su dag pa dang ldan
K10D0124_H0126:430b-17: pa / brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
K10D0124_H0126:430b-18: yongs su dag pa dang ldan par de bzhin gshegs
K10D0124_H0126:430b-19: pa / pa / rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10D0124_H0126:430b-22: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10D0124_H0126:430b-23: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom
K10D0124_H0126:430b-24: ldan 'das dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig
K10D0124_H0126:430b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan de'i sangs
K10D0124_H0126:430b-27: rgyas kyi zhing de na'ang dge slong dpa' sra zhes
K10D0124_H0126:430b-29: yid gzhungs pa; bye brag phyed pa /
K10D0124_H0126:430b-31: shes rab kyi rang bzhin can zhig byung ste /
K10D0124_H0126:430b-32: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
K10D0124_H0126:430b-33: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal
K10D0124_H0126:431a-0: @431a *// mtshan de la rim gro byed par gyur to //
K10D0124_H0126:431a-1: des de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan de
K10D0124_H0126:431a-2: la lo bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu'i bar du
K10D0124_H0126:431a-3: shin tu gus par byas te bshad pa rnams kyang
K10D0124_H0126:431a-4: gzungs su 'dzin cing rang gi don kyang mi gtong
K10D0124_H0126:431a-5: ste / des de bzhin gshegs pa la lo bye
K10D0124_H0126:431a-6: ba khrag khrig brgyad cu'i bar du thams cad mkhyen
K10D0124_H0126:431a-7: pa nyid kyi sems kyis rim gro byas te /
K10D0124_H0126:431a-8: de'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag
K10D0124_H0126:431a-9: khrig dpag tu med pa rnams mnyes par byas nas
K10D0124_H0126:431a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi rim
K10D0124_H0126:431a-11: gro byed par gyur te; de bzhin gshegs pa de
K10D0124_H0126:431a-12: dag thams cad la'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
K10D0124_H0126:431a-13: sems kyis bsnyen bkur byas so //
K10D0124_H0126:431a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis thog ma dang /
K10D0124_H0126:431a-16: tha ma dus gsum du bstan pa rnams yongs su bzung bar gyur to //
K10D0124_H0126:431a-17: de'i 'og tu zhi ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i
K10D0124_H0126:431a-18: bskal pa de la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu
K10D0124_H0126:431a-19: byung ste / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
K10D0124_H0126:431a-20: thams cad byang chub sems dpa' des yang mnyes par
K10D0124_H0126:431a-21: byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad
K10D0124_H0126:431a-22: kyi rim gro byed par gyur te /
K10D0124_H0126:431a-23: de dag thams cad la'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
K10D0124_H0126:431a-24: kyi sems kyis rim gro byas nas de bzhin gshegs
K10D0124_H0126:431a-25: pa de dag thams cad kyi thog ma dang /
K10D0124_H0126:431b-0: tha ma dus gsum du bstan pa rnams yongs su bzung @431b ngo //
K10D0124_H0126:431b-1: de'i 'og tu zla 'od ces bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste /
K10D0124_H0126:431b-2: de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
K10D0124_H0126:431b-3: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog mkhas pa'i
K10D0124_H0126:431b-4: rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo
K10D0124_H0126:431b-5: // de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po de'i tshe'i tshad ni /
K10D0124_H0126:431b-6: bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyad cur gyur te /
K10D0124_H0126:431b-7: de la'ang byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sra des bskal
K10D0124_H0126:431b-8: pa bye ba brgyad cu'i bar du yid du 'ong
K10D0124_H0126:431b-10: yid du mi 'ong bas ma yin no //
K10D0124_H0126:431b-11: de la de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i
K10D0124_H0126:431b-12: rgyal po zhes bya ba des bskal pa bye ba
K10D0124_H0126:431b-13: brgyad cu'i bar du ji ltar chos kyi dbyings la
K10D0124_H0126:431b-15: nam mkha' la bris pa lta bur chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pa bstan to //
K10D0124_H0126:431b-16: bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu'i bar du chos thams
K10D0124_H0126:431b-17: cad nam mkha' la bris pa lta bur bstan te
K10D0124_H0126:431b-21: nam mkha' la bris pa lta bu'i chos thams cad ni /
K10D0124_H0126:431b-22: cung zad kyang gzhan du 'gyur ba med do //
K10D0124_H0126:431b-23: de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sras chos kyi
K10D0124_H0126:431b-24: dbyings la 'jug pa 'di thos nas 'di lta bu'i
K10D0124_H0126:431b-25: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs thob ste /
K10D0124_H0126:431b-26: ji lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs thob pas
K10D0124_H0126:431b-27: nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid du 'phags te
K10D0124_H0126:431b-28: / des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu
K10D0124_H0126:431b-29: med pa na byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med
K10D0124_H0126:432a-0: pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag @432a *//
K10D0124_H0126:432a-1: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mthong /
K10D0124_H0126:432a-3: bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor /
K10D0124_H0126:432a-5: rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa du mas sems can rnams 'dul /
K10D0124_H0126:432a-9: phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das
K10D0124_H0126:432a-10: pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba
K10D0124_H0126:432a-11: mthong nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon
K10D0124_H0126:432a-12: mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po de la zab mo'i tshigs
K10D0124_H0126:432a-13: su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do
K10D0124_H0126:432a-14: // zhi ba byang chub mtshungs med btsal slad du //
K10D0124_H0126:432a-15: bdag gis sangs rgyas 'das pa bye stong la //
K10D0124_H0126:432a-16: shin tu gus pa chen po bskyed nas su //
K10D0124_H0126:432a-17: sngon gyi 'dren pa dag la bsnyen bkur bgyis //
K10D0124_H0126:432a-18: sems ni nam yang gzhan du ma bsam ste //
K10D0124_H0126:432a-19: rtag par yid ni stong pa nyid la bzhag /
K10D0124_H0126:432a-20: chos rnams stong bar bde bar gshegs pas bstan //
K10D0124_H0126:432a-21: de dag chos kyang yid kyis rnam par bsam; ;bdag tu smra ba mi gang mi mkhas pa //
K10D0124_H0126:432a-22: mu stegs can kun bdag gis zil gyis mnan //
K10D0124_H0126:432a-23: chos rnams thams cad chu yi zla ba bzhin //
K10D0124_H0126:432a-24: de la bdag ni the tshom cang ma mchis /
K10D0124_H0126:432a-25: mig 'di dam pa'i don du stong par ni //
K10D0124_H0126:432a-26: bde bar gshegs pas bshad pa thos nas rtogs //
K10D0124_H0126:432a-27: mig 'di mig tu mchis pa ma lags te //
K10D0124_H0126:432a-28: mdzangs pa ma lags mi rnams 'di la slad //
K10D0124_H0126:432b-0: @432b nges par sna lce rna ba de bzhin te //
K10D0124_H0126:432b-1: lus kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mchis ma lags //
K10D0124_H0126:432b-2: de bzhin sems dang sems pa'ang stong pa nyid //
K10D0124_H0126:432b-3: sems ni dben zhing rab tu stong pa lags //
K10D0124_H0126:432b-4: gzugs kyang gzugs kyis rnam par dben zhing stong //
K10D0124_H0126:432b-5: sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg kyang stong //
K10D0124_H0126:432b-6: chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid stong ste //
K10D0124_H0126:432b-7: skye mched de dag ngo bo nyid kyis stong //
K10D0124_H0126:432b-8: de bzhin khams kyang khams rnams nyid kyis stong //
K10D0124_H0126:432b-9: bden pa'ang bden pas de bzhin stong pa ste //
K10D0124_H0126:432b-10: 'di la mdzangs pa ma lags 'gro ba rnams kyang bslad //
K10D0124_H0126:432b-11: gang na'ang stong par rig pa ma mchis par //
K10D0124_H0126:432b-12: nam mkha' bar snang bya yi rjes dang mtshungs //
K10D0124_H0126:432b-13: gang na'ang ngo bo nyid ni ma mchis pa //
K10D0124_H0126:432b-14: de ni nam yang gzhan gyi rgyur mi 'gyur //
K10D0124_H0126:432b-15: gang gis ngo bo nyid ni mi rnyed par //

K10D0124_H0126:441b-16: sangs rgyas bye ba stong rnams dang //
K10D0124_H0126:441b-18: srog chags so so'i dge ba rnams //
K10D0124_H0126:441b-19: rjes su dran pas rab tu mkhyen //
K10D0124_H0126:441b-20: de slad sangs rgyas chos rnams la //
K10D0124_H0126:441b-21: 'dren pa'i ye shes thogs mi mnga'//
K10D0124_H0126:441b-22: gang dang gang gi lus kyis su //
K10D0124_H0126:441b-23: ji lta bu yi rgyud du mchi //
K10D0124_H0126:441b-24: de yang thams cad mkhyen pas mkhyen //
K10D0124_H0126:441b-25: de slad rgyal bas lhag ma mchis //
K10D0124_H0126:441b-26: 'dren pa chos rnams thams cad la //
K10D0124_H0126:441b-27: khyod ni the tshom yong mi mnga'//
K10D0124_H0126:441b-28: sems can kun gyi spyod yul yang //
K10D0124_H0126:441b-29: sangs rgyas spyan gyis rab tu gzigs //
K10D0124_H0126:441b-31: khyod 'dra ba ni yong mi gda'//
K10D0124_H0126:441b-32: lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad na //
K10D0124_H0126:441b-33: thub pa khyod las lhag ma mchis //
K10D0124_H0126:441b-34: zag pa zad pa'ang rab tu mkhyen //
K10D0124_H0126:441b-35: ma lus pa yang rtogs par gyur //
K10D0124_H0126:441b-36: nyon mongs thams cad yongs su spangs //
K10D0124_H0126:441b-37: khyod kyis bag chags kun kyang bcom //
K10D0124_H0126:441b-38: sems can kun gyi nyon mongs dang //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-1: mkhyen; ;gang la nyon mongs spyod yul dang //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-3: nyon mongs dag la spyad pas na //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-4: bag chags rjes su 'jug pa rnams //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-5: de dag kun kyang khyed mkhyen te //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-6: de las khyod ni pha rol phyin //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-7: bdag dang pha rol rnams kyi yang //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-8: nyon mongs gang gis spong ba yi //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-9: lam de rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-10: de slad khyod ni lam la mkhas //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-12: mtha' yas brtson 'grus de bstod nas //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-13: bskal bye khrag khrig mtha' yas par //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-14: 'gro ba gnyis su de skyes so //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-15: 'di nas lha ris nga skyes te //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-16: rtag par lha yi dbang por 'gyur //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-17: bye ba mtha' yas lha rnams la //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-18: rgyal ba'i ye shes thob par bstan //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-19: lha yi gnas nas shi 'phos te //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-20: mi yi dbang po rgyal por gyur //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-21: sems can khrag khrig mtha' yas pa //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-22: rgyal ba'i ye shes thob par bstan //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-23: de dag nga yi chos thos nas //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-24: bsti stang mtshungs med bskyed nas su //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-25: sems ni thams cad nyer bzhag ste //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-26: dri med sems kyis de dag nyan //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-27: sems can bye ba mtha' yas pa //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-28: byang chub mchog la nges par gyur //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-29: nga yi tshig thos rtogs pa ni //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-30: sangs rgyas byang chub nges par gyur //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-31: sangs rgyas bye ba mtha' yas pa //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-32: sangs rgyas zhing gi rgya bshad kyang //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-33: bskal pa khrag khrig mtha' yas su //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-34: rgya chen bshad pa mi zad do //
K10D0124_H0126:442a-35: sangs rgyas yon tan gang brjod par //
K10D0124_H0126:442b-0: drang srong chen @442b pos zhing bsngags pa //
K10D0124_H0126:442b-1: thams cad rang bzhin stong par bshad //
K10D0124_H0126:442b-2: de dag ma skyes mi 'gag bstan //
K10D0124_H0126:442b-3: gang 'dir sangs rgyas bsngags pa dang //
K10D0124_H0126:442b-4: sangs rgyas yon tan gang bstan dang //
K10D0124_H0126:442b-5: bde bar gshegs pas zhing brjod pa //
K10D0124_H0126:442b-6: gang gis bshad pa'ang de dang 'dra //
K10D0124_H0126:442b-7: chos rnams zhi bar bde gshegs bshad //
K10D0124_H0126:442b-8: zhi ba'i rang bzhin de mi rnyed //
K10D0124_H0126:442b-9: gang la bshad pa de yang stod //
K10D0124_H0126:442b-11: de nas bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po
K10D0124_H0126:442b-12: lta bu'i bu mo blo gros mtha' yas kyis bcom
K10D0124_H0126:442b-13: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas
K10D0124_H0126:442b-14: la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par
K10D0124_H0126:442b-15: bstod nas bud med kyi dbang po las gyur te
K10D0124_H0126:442b-16: // de phyin chad bud med kyi lus su mi skye bar gyur to //
K10D0124_H0126:442b-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas
K10D0124_H0126:442b-20: kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su sbyang bar 'dod
K10D0124_H0126:442b-21: cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
K10D0124_H0126:442b-22: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod
K10D0124_H0126:442b-23: pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i stong
K10D0124_H0126:442b-24: pa nyid sgrib pa med pa la bslab par bya'o
K10D0124_H0126:442b-25: // chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe sangs
K10D0124_H0126:442b-26: rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad rnam par 'gyur ba
K10D0124_H0126:443a-5: kun tu rab tu chem chem /
K10D0124_H0126:443a-6: shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho /
K10D0124_H0126:443a-7: nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho /
K10D0124_H0126:443a-8: lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho /
K10D0124_H0126:443a-9: byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho /
K10D0124_H0126:443a-11: mtha' dma' na dbus mtho bar gyur to //
K10D0124_H0126:443a-12: srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa
K10D0124_H0126:443a-13: drug len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems
K10D0124_H0126:443a-18: dge bsnyen ma tshad med pa phrag brgya ni /
K10D0124_H0126:443a-19: chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go //
K10D0124_H0126:443a-20: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa ni /
K10D0124_H0126:443a-21: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K10D0124_H0126:443a-22: srog chags stong phrag dpag tu med pa rnams dang /
K10D0124_H0126:443a-23: lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye rgu sngon sems ma bskyed pa rnams ni /
K10D0124_H0126:443a-24: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so //
K10D0124_H0126:443a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas
K10D0124_H0126:443a-26: byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong po de
K10D0124_H0126:443a-27: dag dang / dge slong de dag dang /
K10D0124_H0126:443a-29: mi dang; lha ma yin dang /
K10D0124_H0126:443a-30: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom
K10D0124_H0126:443a-31: ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do
K10D0124_H0126:443b-0: // 'phags pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba theg @443b pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10D0124_H0126:443b-1: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K10D0124_H0126:443b-3: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe ye shes sdes
K10D0124_H0126:443b-4: zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas slad kyis
